p: Other than previously mentioned activities, the P. biglobosa extract has also been demonstrated to have antimalarial effect [ 11], whereas P. clappertoniana [ 75] and P. biglobosa [ 216] show nephro- and hepatoprotective effects, respectively ( Table 3). P. pendula seeds also enhance wound healing in immunosuppressed mice [ 217]. However, extensive studies regarding these effects were not performed. Further studies need to be conducted to explore the possible mechanisms that are involved in the aforementioned beneficial effects.
